name: Rywhal.github.io
tagline: My blog about my adventures in learning new programming languages
body:
### New Adventure
My very first programming adventure for this blog is going to be coffeescript. I want to use it to write some hubot scripts, but we'll see what happens


It starts with one command    o.O
```
$ npm install coffee-script
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/coffee-script
npm http 200 https://registry.npmjs.org/coffee-script
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/coffee-script/-/coffee-script-1.7.1.tgz
npm http 200 https://registry.npmjs.org/coffee-script/-/coffee-script-1.7.1.tgz
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/mkdirp
npm http 200 https://registry.npmjs.org/mkdirp
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/mkdirp/-/mkdirp-0.3.5.tgz
npm http 200 https://registry.npmjs.org/mkdirp/-/mkdirp-0.3.5.tgz
coffee-script@1.7.1 node_modules/coffee-script
└── mkdirp@0.3.5
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
